params.makerTokenFilledAmount: How much maker token was filled.
params.orderHash: The canonical hash of the order.
params.pool: The fee pool associated with this order.
params.protocolFeePaid: How much protocol fee was paid.
params.takerTokenFilledAmount: How much taker token was filled.

OrderCancelled(bytes32,address).details: Emitted whenever a limit or RFQ order is cancelled.

params.orderHash: The canonical hash of the order.

PairCancelledLimitOrders(address,address.details: Emitted whenever Limit orders are cancelled by pair by a maker.

params.makerToken: The maker token in a pair for the orders cancelled.
params.minValidSalt: The new minimum valid salt an order with this pair must        have.
params.takerToken: The taker token in a pair for the orders cancelled.

PairCancelledRfqOrders(address,address,a.details: Emitted whenever RFQ orders are cancelled by pair by a maker.

params.makerToken: The maker token in a pair for the orders cancelled.
params.minValidSalt: The new minimum valid salt an order with this pair must        have.
params.takerToken: The taker token in a pair for the orders cancelled.

params.makerTokenFilledAmount: How much maker token was filled.
params.orderHash: The canonical hash of the order.
params.pool: The fee pool associated with this order.
params.takerTokenFilledAmount: How much taker token was filled.

RfqOrderOriginsAllowed(address,address[].details: Emitted when new addresses are allowed or disallowed to fill      orders with a given txOrigin.

params.allowed: Indicates whether the address should be allowed.
